Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at London Hilton on Park Lane places you in the heart of London, walking distance from Apsley House and Hyde Park Corner. This 5-star hotel is close to Buckingham Palace and Selfridges.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 453 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a nightclub, a health club, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at London Hilton on Park Lane places you in the heart of London, walking distance from Apsley House and Hyde Park Corner. This 5-star hotel is close to Buckingham Palace and Selfridges.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Apsley House - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Hyde Park Corner - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Wellington Arch - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Green Park - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Berkeley Square - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Grosvenor Square - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Spencer House - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Buckingham Palace - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Royal Mews - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Queen's Gallery - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
St. James Palace - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Royal Academy of Arts - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
St. James Park - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
St. James's Square - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Hyde Park Speakers' Corner - 1 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 13.9 km / 8.6 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 21.1 km / 13.1 mi

The preferred airport for London Hilton on Park Lane is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Hilton London Park Lane are:
London (LCY-London City) - 13.9 km / 8.6 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 21.1 km / 13.1 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 38.9 km / 24.2 mi

The preferred airport for Hilton London Park Lane is London (LHR-Heathrow).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text: Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
